ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard Mana???
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a little teapot ?  Damn, no wonder I can t get it to work I ve been using Itsy, Bitsy Spider  8-p Kit ... From: Robert(Bob) Smith
ygData.messageBody:
"I'm a little teapot"? Damn, no wonder I can't get it to work I've been
using "Itsy, Bitsy Spider" 8-p

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2001 2:25 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Bard Mana???


> Keep in mind, manasong, clarity, and other mana regen ...
> things ... have no impact on the bards mana regen.

Ummm... this is not quite true...

While Gaelthorne is now retired (his player no longer playing EQ,) he
found out that singing "I'm a little teapot..." while alternating
sitting and standing between pulses of manasong DID make his mana
regen increase.

Could one of you test and see if this is still true?


Be well,

Gaelthorne
Xegony
